title.rendered: Summer Internship Programme 2025 at NIT Calicut [1-2 Months, May 1-July 10]: Apply by March 26

content.rendered:
Applications are invited for Summer Internship Programme 2025 at NIT Calicut. The last date of application is March 26.

About the Internship

Applications are invited from eligible Students for Internship during summer vacation 2025 or Project Internship in various Laboratories at NIT Calicut as per the following conditions:

The Summer Internship Programme (SIP) will be generally offered for a period of 30/60 days during the summer vacation between May 1 – July 10, 2025, in line with the academic calendar of NITC. Selected candidates may be permitted to do projects using the specific laboratory facilities in certain departments.

Eligibility

  • Students must meet the following conditions to apply:
    • B.Tech./BE students completing the Second/Third year (or Fourth/Sixth Semester).
    • B.Arch. students completing the Fourth/Sixth/Eighth Semester.
    • M.Tech./ME/M.Sc./M.Plan/MBA students completing the First Year (or Second Semester).
  • Minimum CGPA: 6.5 (out of 10) or 65% aggregate marks (up to the latest published semester results).
  • Candidates must be regular full-time students with no back papers and no disciplinary actions from their parent institute.
  • Students of NIT Calicut are not eligible to apply as this is a scheme exclusively for students outside NITC.

How to Apply?

Interested Students need to fill up and submit the Form with the necessary information and documents on or before 5.00 PM on 26th March 2025 (Wednesday).

Application Fee

There is a registration fee of INR 118 at the time of registration.

Internship Fee

If selected, you must complete the fee payment for the internship duration chosen on or before April 16, 2025:

  • 2-Month Internship Fee: Rs. 5900 (inclusive of GST)
  • 1-Month Internship Fee: Rs. 3540 (inclusive of GST)

Important dates

  • Application start date: March 11, 2025 Tuesday
  • Application end date and time: March 26, 2025 Wednesday, 05.00 PM
  • Scrutiny of applications/ Selection process by the respective department: April 01-08,2025
  • Candidate may be called for an Interview (if any) by the respective department between March 26 – April 08, 2025
  • Selection intimation by CCD: April 09-16, 2025
  • SIP will be between May 1 and July 09, 2025

Selection Process

The selection of Interns will be done by the respective departments of NITC based on the following parameters but not limited to:

  • Academic performance in university examinations (CGPA / percentage of marks).
  • Paper presented if any at conferences/ workshops, projects already executed/completed.
  • Academic/co-curricular contests participated and other awards/distinctions obtained.
  • Performance during a personal interview conducted (if any)

Contact

For any queries related to the application, please email: sip@nitc.ac.in.
